name: ftcolumnflow
author: FT Labs <enquiries@labs.ft.com> (http://labs.ft.com/)
description: FTColumnflow is a polyfill that fixes the inadequacies of CSS column layouts.

scripts.test-server: set -m; echo 'Starting a test server. Your browser should open at http://localhost:1112 so that Buster can capture it.'; ./node_modules/.bin/grunt server-only & sleep 2; open http://localhost:1112/capture; fg;
scripts.tests-only: echo 'Running tests; ensure you have already captured a browser at http://localhost:1112'; ./node_modules/.bin/grunt tests-only
